attributes.action: Seek a change in the law so that any expense claim in the Houses of Commons or Lords that is queried as being false is automatically investigated by the police
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Sunday Times has reported that Baroness Uddin has been claiming substantial amounts of taxpayers' money under her expenses for a flat that she did not occupy. This can only be determined as fraud and not a politically correct mode of obtaining expenses.

rejection.details: The Government does not investigate criminal proceedings. That would be a matter for the police, and where necessary the Crown Prosecution Service, who are independent of Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
